set (TARGET_NAME toluapp)

# Define source files
define_source_files (GLOB_CPP_PATTERNS *.c)

# Define dependency libs

# Setup target
setup_library ()

# Install headers for building and using the Urho3D library (no direct dependencies but library user may need them)
